values: 长凳；长椅；工作台；试验台；法官；法官席位；替补席；教练席；运动员休息区；（砖石建筑的）壁架；（斜坡上的）平台
把（场上队员）换下；把（场上队员）罚出场；不让（队员）上场；在…放置长凳

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指带有靠背的椅子，有时也指有靠背有扶手的椅子。
指可供两人或更多人坐的长凳或石凳，多置于公园或划艇中。
多指方的或圆的无靠背无扶手一人坐的凳子。

word_group.brief_definition: 当法官；当治安官；当替补队员
后座议员席；普通议员席；下院后座议员；下院普通议员
测试台；试验台；检测实验台
公园长凳；公园板凳；公园长椅
台架规模；台架；实验室规模
钳工工作；钳加工；场外指导

bilingual.target: 我们坐在这条长凳上吧。
这条长凳是用木头做的。

bilingual.source: Sit on the bench and enjoy the view.
She refused to sit on the dirty bench.
bilingual.target: 她拒绝坐在那条脏长凳上。

bilingual.source: The children are eating lunch on the bench.
bilingual.target: 孩子们在长凳上吃午餐。

bilingual.source: They painted the bench a bright red color.
bilingual.target: 他们把长凳漆成了鲜红色。

bilingual.source: The park has a wooden bench under the tree.
bilingual.target: 公园里有一条树下的木长凳。

bilingual.source: He placed his bag on the bench before jogging.
bilingual.target: 他在慢跑前把包放在长凳上。

bilingual.source: The old man rested on the bench after his walk.
bilingual.target: 老人在散步后在长凳上休息。

bilingual.source: The antique shop had a beautiful castiron bench for sale.
bilingual.target: 古董店有一条漂亮的铸铁长凳出售。

list.abstract: bench是诞生于90年代中期的服装品牌。

yingyinNormal.en: So, I finally came upon a bus bench where I sat and removed one of my shirts and, fashioned it into a makeshift shoe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最终坐在一张公车站的长凳上脱掉了我的一件衣服用它做了一只临时的鞋。

yingyinNormal.en: In the subway? Yeah, he saw me and one day he just started hanging out there. On the platform, the trains would come and go. He just sat there on the bench.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在地铁里吗？对，他看见了我，之后就天天呆在那儿，站台上面地铁来来去去。他就坐在站台的长凳上。

yingyinNormal.en: Nothing changes. You painted a cat. The cat's on a bench! I don't see the bench. I will cut my ear off right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我画的就是啊。你画的是只猫。是长椅上的猫。我没看见长椅。我马上把我的耳朵割下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Why'd you pick that bench? I don't know. I just did.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么选那张长椅？我不知道，就是选了。很显然它影响了你。

yingyinNormal.en: Bit of flour on the bench. Get your dough out, shape it into a rough rectangle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在面板上撒一些面粉，取出面团，做成长方形。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, he had a bunch of outstanding tickets and a bench warrant, so I, you know, I paid his fines.
yingyinNormal.zh: 话说他有很多罚款单，还有一堆告票，所以，我帮他付了罚款。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, this is hollow. What? This bench, it's hollow. I can't believe I never knew that. Oh, the presents.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是空的。什么？这排座椅是空心的，我居然都不知道，我们的礼物。

yingyinNormal.en: The accused got a gun from the sheriff. We were at a sidebar at the bench. He hit the witness, killed him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被告从法警身上拿到了枪，我们当时正在法官席边，他开枪射杀了证人。

yingyinNormal.en: My handwriting? Yes. I need to establish who wrote the report. I'm sorry, but I don't see how that's appropriate. I mean 20 years have gone by. Take her a piece of paper. Counselor. Approach the bench. Are we really going to compare handwriting of 20 years...? Counselor Approach the bench.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的笔迹？是的，我需要确认是谁写了报告。我认为这不合适。这已经是20年前的事了。把纸拿给她，放到被告席上。比较20年前后的笔迹？把纸放到被告席上。

yingyinNormal.en: I tried to bench you. You refused. Unlike everyone else in your life, I don't work for you. And due to that fact, we're now in a flying doughnut billions of miles from Earth with no backup. I'm backup. No, you're a stowaway.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我让你别插手的。你不肯。不像你人生中的其他所有人，我不为你工作。因为这个，我们现在在一艘飞行甜甜圈上离地球十万八千里还没有后援。我是后援。不，你是偷渡的。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (the ~)替补队员; 使比赛员退场
长凳; 条凳; 板凳; 使坐下

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a long, sturdy work table used by a carpenter, mechanic, scientist, or other worker
a seat on which sports coaches and players sit during a game when they are not playing
sense_info_list.zh: (the ~)替补队员; 使比赛员退场

sense_info_list.en: a long seat for several people, typically made of wood or stone
sense_info_list.zh: 长凳; 条凳; 板凳; 使坐下

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: a long seat for several people; typically made of wood or stone
sense_info_list.zh: 长凳; 条凳; 板凳; 使坐下

examination_example.sentence: He is now supporting "friendly <highlight>benches</highlight>," which are public seating areas where people are encouraged to go and chat with one another.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他现在支持“友好的长椅”，这是一种鼓励人们聊天的公共座位区。

sense_info_list.en: a seat on which sports coaches and players sit during a game when they are not playing
sense_info_list.zh: (the ~)替补队员; 使比赛员退场

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指可供两人或更多人坐的长凳或石凳，多置于公园或划艇中。
通常指带有靠背的椅子，有时也指有靠背有扶手的椅子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a long seat for several people, typically made of wood or stone

examination_example.sentence: More new chat <highlight>benches</highlight> have sprung up across the UK and beyond.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更多新的聊天长椅在英国和其他国家涌现。

examination_example.sentence: Then he hung a colorful sign on each of the <highlight>benches</highlight> that read: "HAPPY TO CHAT."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他在每条长凳上挂了一块彩色的牌子，上面写着：“很高兴聊天。”

examination_example.sentence: Members leave books on park <highlight>benches</highlight> and buses, in train stations and coffee shops.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 会员们把书放在公园的长椅上、公交车上、火车站和咖啡店里。

sense_info_list.en: a seat on which sports coaches and players sit during a game when they are not playing
the seats where players sit when they are not playing in the game

examination_example.sentence: That season, I broke all of Miller's records while he watched the home games from the <highlight>bench</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个赛季，我打破了米勒所有的记录，而他在替补席上观看了主场比赛。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指可供两人或更多人坐的长凳或石凳，多置于公园或划艇中。
通常指带有靠背的椅子，有时也指有靠背有扶手的椅子。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a long seat for several people, typically made of wood or stone

examination_example.sentence: As I was sitting on the <highlight>bench</highlight>, waiting for class to begin, I saw Timothy waving a brown paper bag at Jenna.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我坐在长凳上等待课程开始时，我看到蒂莫西在詹娜面前挥舞着一个棕色纸袋。

examination_example.sentence: We can build <highlight>benches</highlight> that last 400 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以造出可以使用400年的长椅。

examination_example.sentence: Then it can be formed into park <highlight>benches</highlight>, playgrounds and so on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后它可以形成公园的长椅，操场等。
